title: Producer Of 'Knight Rider' And 'Battlestar Galactica' Dies At 77
teaser: Glen A. Larson, who produced some of the most iconic television shows of the '70s and '80s, died this week. NPR's Arun Rath talks to Variety's Cynthia Littelton about his legacy and the shows that got away.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
